an3.30:1.3: Avakujjapanno puggalo, ucchangapanno puggalo, puthupanno puggalo.
an3.30:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco puggalo aramam ganta hoti abhikkhanam bhikkhunam santike dhammassavanaya.
an3.30:1.6: Tassa bhikkhu dhammam desenti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakasenti.
an3.30:1.7: So tasmim asane nisinno tassa kathaya neva adim manasi karoti, na majjham manasi karoti, na pariyosanam manasi karoti;
an3.30:1.8: vutthitopi tamha asana tassa kathaya neva adim manasi karoti, na majjham manasi karoti, na pariyosanam manasi karoti.
an3.30:1.9: Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, kumbho nikujjo tatra udakam asittam vivattati, no santhati;
an3.30:1.10: evamevam kho, bhikkhave, idhekacco puggalo aramam ganta hoti abhikkhanam bhikkhunam santike dhammassavanaya.
an3.30:1.11: Tassa bhikkhu dhammam desenti adikalyanam majjhekalyanam pariyosanakalyanam sattham sabyanjanam, kevalaparipunnam parisuddham brahmacariyam pakasenti.
